oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1959-03-21 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from March 21, 1959. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Porter Wagoner (host/performer), guest performer Billy Walker, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Archie Campbell, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1015th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Archie Campbell; Billy Walker; Jordanaires; Del Wood; Porter Wagoner
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Porter Wagoner introduces Archie Campbell -- Comedy routine (Archie Campbell, Porter Wagoner, unidentified) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Archie Campbell) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Porter Wagoner introduces Billy Walker -- I Thought About You (Billy Walker, Jordanaires) -- Porter Wagoner introduces Del Wood -- Sunday Down South (Del Wood) -- Grant Turner and Porter Wagoner talk -- Out Of Sight Out Of Mind (Porter Wagoner) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Porter Wagoner) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial -- Network announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Turner, Grant; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Jackson, Tommy; Jordanaires (Musical group); Campbell, Archie; Smathers, Ben, -1990; Stoney Mountain Cloggers; Wagoner, Porter; Warden, Don, 1929-; Gale, Red; Walker, Billy, 1929-2006
